content.rendered:
Material                    : High quality Kanekalon fiber ,100% Japanese A class hear resist fiber well blending with your own hair .

Size                         ：Adjustable size with a elastic hair band for use. Diameter: 5.5″

Function                  ： Synthetic Wavy/Curly hair bun ,perfect to enrich volume of your own hair and it is completely reusable.

Suitable Occasions : For any occasion Daily use/Party Cosplay /Human Hair Gift/Date/Wedding.

Impotant note          : This Hair can be reused , however cannot be curled, straightened, washed or dyed.
